name: Beast Hide
description: Raw hides from Tower creatures, used to create leather after processing.

name: Bones
description: Remnants of fallen Tower creatures, used in crafting tools, weapons, and as components in rituals.

name: Cloth
description: Woven fabrics produced from the fibers of Tower plants and animal textiles, essential for clothing and crafting.

name: Coal
description: Used as fuel in smelting and crafting.

name: Feather
description: Used in crafting arrows and quills.

name: Gemstones
description: Precious and semi-precious stones unearthed from the Tower's mineral-rich veins, prized for their beauty and magical properties.

name: Glass
description: Transparent material formed by melting silicates found within the Tower's volcanic vents, used in containers and lenses.

name: Gold Ingot
description: A bar of pure gold, used in crafting and trade.

name: Grain
description: Harvested grains used in cooking and baking.

name: Herbs
description: Varieties of medicinal and magical plants grown in potted gardens, utilized in potions, salves, and rituals.

name: Hemp Fibers
description: Strong fibers extracted from hemp plants, used in crafting rope and textiles.

name: Ink
description: Dark liquid extracted from the glands of ink-producing Tower cephalopods, essential for writing and spell inscriptions.

name: Leather
description: Tanned hides obtained from various Tower beasts, employed in crafting armor, garments, and accessories.

name: Metal Ore
description: Raw metallic minerals mined from the Tower's deep caverns, serving as the foundation for tool and weapon forging.

name: Morning Dew
description: Fresh dew collected at dawn, carrying the essence of new beginnings.

name: Molten Lava
description: Molten rock from the earth's core, extremely hot and volatile.

name: Moonlit Dew
description: Dew collected under moonlight, imbued with lunar energy.

name: Oil
description: Viscous liquid extracted from the glands of Tower-dwelling creatures, used for lubrication, crafting, and alchemical purposes.

name: Paper
description: Sheets crafted from the shaved skins of resilient Tower creatures, used for writing, spell inscriptions, and documentation.

name: Powdered Stone
description: Fine particles crushed from Tower minerals, used in construction, alchemy, and as a crafting ingredient.

name: Rope
description: Bundles of strong hemp fibers spun from the Tower's hardy plants, indispensable for climbing, binding, and various construction needs.

name: Shredded Skin
description: Thin strips of skin shaved from Tower monsters, used in crafting, binding, and as a base for scrolls.

name: Silica Sand
description: Fine sand rich in silicon dioxide, essential for glassmaking.

name: Spider Silk
description: Strong, elastic threads spun by Tower spiders, indispensable for crafting ropes, nets, and magical bindings.

name: Stone
description: A basic stone collected from the Tower's foundation, used in construction and crafting.

name: Water
description: Essential for hydration and cooking.
